data.name: Sorcerer's Dream - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Sorcerer's Dream official soundtrack.
Vivid, Sweet, Tense, various melodies amuse you!
Containing 23 tracks in MP3 file format.

Tracklist:
01. Welcome to the Magic World [3:45]
02. The Past Day [2:02]
03. The Past Day (Short) [1:35]
04. Hello Sunshine [1:23]
05. Under the Blue Sky [1:41]
06. Beautiful Sunset [3:08]
07. Peace of Mind [1:33]
08. EHHHHH? [2:03]
09. Sorrowful Holy Girl [1:21]
10. Shop in Mysterious Witch [3:29]
11. Let's Go Easily [2:07]
12. Silent Menace [2:42]
13. The Madness [3:27]
14. Bloody Edge [1:29]
15. Unreal Enemy [2:51]
16. Girl, Don't Cry [1:46]
17. Lose Something [2:45]
18. Cosmic [1:57]
19. Devils [1:50]
20. Another World [3:02]
21. Little Justice [3:36]
22. Bright Daybreak [2:23]
23. Our Dream [2:31]
